div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
This particular apple
────────
Red, round, 6oz,
sweet taste, crisp texture

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
External Senses
────────
Receive sensible forms:
color, shape, texture, taste

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Common Sense
────────
Integrates modalities
into unified perception

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Imagination
────────
Stores phantasm:
'Image of THIS apple'
────────
Particular, spatial,
material representation

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
AGENT INTELLECT
────────
Illuminates phantasm
Makes actually intelligible
────────
Like light making colors visible
Actualizes potential

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ABSTRACTION OCCURS
────────
Universal form 'apple-ness'
separated from particulars
────────
Not 'this apple' but
'what makes an apple an apple'

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PASSIVE INTELLECT
────────
Receives universal concept
Stores as intelligible species
────────
Inner word: mental concept

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
OUTER WORDS
────────
Linguistic expressions:
'apple' (English)
'malum' (Latin)
'manzana' (Spanish)
────────
All express same inner word

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
LLM Processing
────────
✓ Tokens: 'apple', 'malum', 'manzana'
✓ Embeddings: geometric clustering
✓ Pattern: similar contexts
────────
✗ No agent intellect (cannot illuminate)
✗ No abstraction (cannot extract universal)
✗ No passive intellect (cannot receive concept)
────────
Discovers statistical patterns
NOT universal essences
